snippet: The board of trustees of Florida A&M University voted 8 to 4 on Thursday that it did not have confidence in the leadership of the university president, James Ammons.
abstract: Florida A&M University board of trustees levels 8-to-4 no-confidence vote against the leadership of the university president James Ammons, saying they do not believe he can steer the school out of the crisis that followed the hazing death of drum major Robert Champion.
lead_paragraph: The board of trustees of Florida A&M University voted 8 to 4 on Thursday that it did not have confidence in the leadership of the university president, James Ammons.

headline.seo: Florida A&M University President Loses Vote
